product.name: Auto Dynasty 6.75" Running Boards for Truck 2007-2019 Chevy Silverado/GMC Sierra 1500 2500HD 3500HD Crew Cab, Stainless Steel Side Steps, Chrome Nerf Bars Step Rails
product.description:
Are the step pads slip resistant when wet?
Yes, our running boards come with ABS plastic covered slip-resistant step pads
How stable are they during entry and exit?
This product has a maximum weight capacity of 450 LBS, providing sufficient stability when you enter and exit the vehicle
Do they require any special tools for installation?
Easy to install, no-drill installation bolts right to factory mounting points in less than an hour (most models)
View
View
View
View
View
View
product.bullet_points:
• Vehicle Compatibility - These running boards are compatible with Chevy Silverado 1500 2007-2018, Chevy Silverado 2500HD 3500HD 2007-2019, GMC Sierra 1500 2007-2018, GMC Sierra 2500HD 3500HD 2007-2019. NOTE: Fits with crew cab models, does NOT fit diesel models equipped with def tank.
• Brilliant Performance - Comes with set of [2] chrome polished finish running boards with ABS plastic covered slip-resistant step pad, can support up to 450lbs.
• Solid Construction Design - It is constructed of durable and rust-resistant stainless steel with heavy duty ABS plastic end caps to ensure a long lasting life.
• Simple Installation - Easy to install, no-drill installation bolts right to factory mounting points in less than an hour (most models). Please note: Vehicle specific mounting brackets included.
• Product Specifics - Width: 6.7" | Overall Length: 82.6" | Weight: 43 LBS | Vehicle Specific Mounting Brackets Included
